name: Superunit
long_description:
Superunit is an AI-powered accounting agent for companies selling physical goods. We have 6 customers doing $8.3k in booked revenue.  For these companies we close the books 5x faster than human teams and with fewer errors.  

We offer automated bookkeeping, supply chain management, inventory costs, and contribution margin analysis.  Our system seamlessly integrates with Quickbooks, eliminating manual data entry and minimizing errors.

Users can interact with Superunit via Slack or email, avoiding the need to learn new software.

(https://www.loom.com/share/1425f6802d774e1aa00a8ac4b64782ff)
one_liner: AI accounting agent for companies selling physical goods
